vote.title: To Recognize and Congratulate Brian Goodson for receiving the 2021 Donald R. Hallman LGBTQ Veterans Recognition Award
vote.description:
Title
 
To Recognize and Congratulate Brian Goodson for receiving the 2021 Donald R. Hallman LGBTQ Veterans Recognition Award
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Brian Goodson is a 10-year veteran of the United States Air Force serving as a Cook, stationed primarily at Ramstein in Germany; and
 
WHEREAS, As leader of the Columbus chapter of Team Red, White, and Blue (RWB), Brian has planned, organized, and executed hundreds, if not thousands, of physical and social activities that have had significant positive influence on thousands of veterans. As proven, getting veterans actively engaged in their community has a direct impact on reduced suicide rates, increased professional and personal success, and general positive outlook on life; and
 
WHEREAS, According to Mike McNett, who nominated Brian for this award, Brian is a caring, empathetic, and professional leader on which his team members depend for guidance and direction. He is a strong advocate for the LGBTQ members of the organization; and
 
WHEREAS, Brian has carried our Nation’s flag in hundreds of races, from local 5K events to the US Service Branch marathons (USMC Marathon, USAF Marathon), to numerous ultra-marathons across the country; now, therefore
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:  
 
That this Council does hereby express its appreciation for Brian Goodson for his service to this country and the LGBTQ and veterans community in Columbus. This Council does hereby congratulate him on receiving the 2021 Donald R. Hallman LGBTQ Veterans Recognition Award from Stonewall Columbus.
